title: Mouse Info API - MouseInfoProvider - Context
content:
<PropName
  name="x"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Current mouse position along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="y"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Current mouse position along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="xDifference"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Last number of pixels moved along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="yDifference"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Last number of pixels moved along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="xDirection"
  type="string"
  isContextProp
/>
Direction of the last mouse movement along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="yDirection"
  type="string"
  isContextProp
/>
Direction of the last mouse movement along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="xPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage moved along the x-axis
<PropName
  name="yPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage moved along the y-axis
<PropName
  name="totalPercentage"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Percentage moved along the both and x and y-axes
<PropName
  name="eventsFired"
  type="number"
  isContextProp
/>
Number of animation frames completed
<PropName
  name="isInViewport"
  type="boolean"
  isContextProp
/>
Toggled as the mouse enters and leaves the viewport
